text: Delicious is a 1931 American romantic musical comedy movie directed by David Butler and starring Janet Gaynor, Charles Farrell, El Brendel, Raul Roulien, Mischa Auer. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 romantic comedy movies Category:1931 musical movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by David Butler Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Delicious (1931 movie)
